    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Animation
    Manages sprite sheet animations by extracting and cycling through frames.
    AudioManager
    Manages all audio and music in the game.
    Collectible
    Interface for items that can be collected by the player.
    Collidable
    Interface for entities that support collision detection.
    CollisionManager
    Manages collision detection and handling between game entities.
    CollisionManager.CollisionResult
    Inner class to store collision results for a frame.
    Entity
    Abstract base class for all game entities.
    GameScreen
    Main game screen that manages the game loop, UI coordination, and user input.
    GameScreen.GameState
    Enum representing the current state of the game.
    HUDRenderer
    Manages all HUD (Heads-Up Display) rendering including score, health bar, and overlays.
    Item
    Represents collectible items in the game.
    Item.Type
    Enum representing different types of collectible items.
    Main
    Main entry point for the "Run Once Run Anywhere" game.
    Obstacle
    Represents hazardous obstacles that damage the player on collision.
    Obstacle.Type
    Enum representing different types of obstacles.
    Platform
    Represents a platform that the player can jump on and land.
    Player
    Represents the player character in the game.
    ScrollingBackground
    Manages infinitely scrolling background layers with parallax effect.
    SpawnManager
    Manages the spawning of game entities (obstacles, items, platforms).
    ThemeRenderer
    Renders visual themes and manages background cycling in the game.
    ThemeRenderer.GrassTile
    Inner class representing a single grass tile in the foreground.
    ThemeRenderer.Theme
    Enum representing different visual themes.
